doc.title: Devashard
doc.plot: After 7,000 years, a dark continent known as the Shallows spreads its seed of evil. The world's only hope lies in a daemon army dedicated to protecting man from oblivion, and when the mighty five-tailed king of this noble army goes mysteriously missing, two immortal sons, one born of darkness, the other of light, will now find their fates intertwined.
